storyInfo: The separation of the secondary core area is imminent. The last generation pins its hopes on the next one.

attributes.content: Grr... We ended up letting him go.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: He stopped wanting to fight us halfway through.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: You felt it too, didn't you? If he really wanted to kill us, he could've gotten it done.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: He just didn't want to take the time.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: We can't underestimate any of the Siracusan famiglie.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: You got one thing wrong.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: I've never underestimated any of them.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Every famiglia is my enemy.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Including the Bellones.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Don't you think you're jumping the gun a bit there?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: You don't seem surprised.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: You betrayed your own boss. You expect me to believe you'd really go in with us?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: But let me point out, now isn't a good time.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Demetri does not waver in the face of Wallach's sharpened blade, instead turning back to his soldiers.
What's going on in the city?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Nothing good.
attributes.name: Bellone Mafioso

attributes.content: The famiglie know the secondary core separation sequence started.
attributes.name: Bellone Mafioso

attributes.content: People are all pretty mad at us and the Saluzzos.
attributes.name: Bellone Mafioso

attributes.content: Wise guys from the other famiglie are hitting us now too.
attributes.name: Bellone Mafioso

attributes.content: What about the thing I asked you to handle?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: You were right on the money...
attributes.name: Bellone Mafioso

attributes.content: The eyes and ears we planted in the other famiglie tell us even though the people are angry at the Bellones and Saluzzos, we aren't their main deal here.
attributes.name: Bellone Mafioso

attributes.content: All the chaos is down there is exactly what all the famiglie were looking for.
attributes.name: Bellone Mafioso

attributes.content: Everything Signora Sicilia kept down is bubbling right up to the surface now.
attributes.name: Bellone Mafioso

attributes.content: There's already fighting over how to divvy up Bellone and Saluzzo assets. And we've got some old grudges out there getting settled.
attributes.name: Bellone Mafioso

attributes.content: Everyone's hopping in, directly or indirectly.
attributes.name: Bellone Mafioso

attributes.content: (*mutters*) This is exactly what you wanted, huh, Boss?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: (*mutters*) So, you betrayed us after all.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Wallach, you're not an idiot. You get that there's no point to us fighting right now.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Isn't it better to solve the big problems first?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Is this how the Rossatis handled everything back in Columbia?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: You really think you can swallow up Siracusa all on your own?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Pick your friends wisely, Wallach.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Grr.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Don't feel too bad.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Not like I'm jumping for joy to team up with somebody like you.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Where's Leon?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: What? He didn't go back home?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Nope. No trace of him anywhere. He's avoiding us, obviously.
attributes.name: Bellone Mafioso

attributes.content: Leon, don't tell me...
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Demetri takes a deep breath.
There's no point in overthinking things now. He has to face reality.
Now that the famiglie are starting to bite one another, this is the best chance we'll have to take the secondary core area.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: If we're gonna have a future, we'll have to take hold of it first.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Don Alberto.
attributes.name: Saluzzo Mafioso

attributes.content: What's the situation?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: It's mayhem out there.
attributes.name: Saluzzo Mafioso

attributes.content: Wise guys from multiple famiglie are taking advantage of the confusion to attack us, and our soldiers have started to fight back.
attributes.name: Saluzzo Mafioso

attributes.content: Things have spiraled out of control.
attributes.name: Saluzzo Mafioso

attributes.content: That's funny. This can't possibly be what that Leontuzzo kid meant.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Now that I think of it, Bernardo, even though Lappland showed up on a whim, you included us in your calculations, didn't you?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: The ironclad law laid down by Sicilia is crumbling. You've set fire to everything that took decades to make Siracusa what she is.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Is this what you wanted? Why?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Where's Lappland?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: We haven't been able to reach her since yesterday morning.
attributes.name: Saluzzo Mafioso

attributes.content: Forget it.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Boss, it's a madhouse out there now. You want us to wait and see if anything changes?
attributes.name: Saluzzo Mafioso

attributes.content: Hmph. Even if I wanted to keep Famiglia Saluzzo out of this, it's no longer possible.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Bernardo, that old runt. Can't believe he even accounted for all this.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Tell our people out there to come back.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Then, send some of our heavies to the command tower in the secondary core area. The Bellones and Rossatis aren't going to let it go.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Do you mean—
attributes.name: Saluzzo Mafioso

attributes.content: I have no interest in that new city, but I'm not about to let it fall into the hands of those who've betrayed me either.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Padre!
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Leon... I never expected you to find this place.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: I happened to recall it from memory.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Since you're here, come take a seat.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: I know what you're trying to do here.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Do you?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Since the very beginning, you've wanted to see Siracusa to return to the dark times of sixty years ago.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You want the famiglie all tearing into each other. If Signora Sicilia didn't step in, Siracusa's famiglie may well have mortally wounded each other.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: But this time, you want them to break free of Signora Sicilia's chains, and to fight each other until nothing is left.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Hmm... So you understand after all.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: But you didn't come here to confirm your conjecture with me, did you?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: What I want to know is, what exactly made you think this way?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: When I was twenty years old, I was just an ordinary Bellone wise guy.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: They wanted me to rub somebody out, I couldn't pull it off, so I had to flee into a nearby village. I took a new identity and went into hiding.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: I lived there for almost six months.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Nothing particularly notable happened during that time.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: But those six months gave me an entirely new perspective on the country I lived in.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: There is no corner of Siracusa completely free from the influence of the famiglie, but in places like the villages outside the city, the famiglie are just your run-of-the-mill thuggish bullies.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: I found a job as a cobbler, and for that summer, I plied my trade by the side of the road and watched them go about their business.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: In the end, nothing they did impressed me at all. But I will never forget that summer when sweat flowed from my brow like rain.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Leon, whether it's you, me, or any other wise guy, we've all been branded from birth.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: But it was during that summer that I realized—
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Life in Siracusa will continue, even with no famiglie.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: So that's why you helped Lavinia, and didn't mind that the two of us were growing closer...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You genuinely want to support her cause. Don't you?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: In all honestly, I did want to see the kind of justice she envisions.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Which is why you didn't have insurance for this plan.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You don't need me, Lavinia, or anyone else assuming any of the risk.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You think that when you tear down the famiglie holding down the people, their lives won't be negatively impacted at all.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Absolutely.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: But that doesn't go far enough, padre mio.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: It doesn't?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: No. It's far from enough.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Letting the famiglie tear into each other until they've worn themselves out may overturn the existing system.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: But that isn't enough to get Siracusa back into the hands of the people.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Are you worried about Signora Sicilia?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: No, what I'm worried about is inertia.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I came to realize something while working as Carracci's assistant.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: The famiglie have had their roots here for thousands of years.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Even if the people reject the famiglie, they have no idea what shape Siracusa might take.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Even after they overthrow the old system, will they manage to build something new?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I don't think so.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: The people will be overwhelmed, not knowing what happened. All they'll know is that their house has suddenly collapsed.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: And when they go to build on top of those ruins, they'll build what amounts to a famiglia.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Nothing will change at all.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: If we continue down this path, we may bring about a Siracusa without famiglie, for a bit.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: But the Siracusa you're dreaming of will never come.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You're dreaming too big, padre mio.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You want to give them your Siracusa, but you never stopped to think if they're willing and able to accept it.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: All we can do is to let everyone out there know what's happening, and involve them in the process.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: That's the only way we can start the conversation on a 'Siracusa without the famiglie.'
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Looks like my son's all grown up.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: I thought you came here for a good, old-fashioned father-son argument.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: I didn't expect you to teach me something.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Padre mio...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: So, what are you going to do?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: I'll go find Lavinia, organize a coalition of non-famiglia forces, and seize control of the secondary core's command tower.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: As long as the new city is under my control, I'll have the advantage.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: As for whether I'll be able to negotiate with Signora Sicilia, or if I'll have to confront her directly, we'll cross that bridge when we come to it.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: But no matter what happens, we'll be betraying Demetri, and our whole famiglia.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Do it your way then, Leon.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: You were the one who started this whole mess. Don't even think about sitting on the sidelines and leaving everything to me.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Don't worry, I'll catch up with you.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Don Agenir, I hear you never set foot in church.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Siracusa doesn't need churches. If we accept the teachings of Laterano, we're doomed to be influenced by their culture.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: In the end, all I can do is choose to distance myself.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: But it's worth making an exception, for a man like you.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Your Honor, everyone's all here. I've counted over fifty.
attributes.name: Bailiff

attributes.content: That's a lot less than before.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The people planted in here by the famiglie have all gone back home, haven't they?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Bailiff

attributes.content: Hah. Ironic as that may be, it does save me some effort.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Listen up.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The courts occupy an awkward position in Siracusa.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: We represent the will of Signora Sicilia, to some extent, and in return, gain a certain amount of power.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: But this power is not enough for us to fulfill our obligations.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Quite the contrary. In many cases, the power we hold only makes us more aware of how powerless we are in the face of the entities known as famiglie.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: We can neither lower our heads and accept it as most ordinary people can, nor can we truly integrate into these famiglie.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Throughout this process, many of our colleagues have been ostracized, pushed out, or even killed because they could not bear the situation any longer.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: In fact, even if they ended up betraying the law, I would not be in a position to blame them.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The truth is, I'm only where I am today because of my connection to Famiglia Bellone.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You all know what happened, and what is happening out there.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: At first I assumed all I could do is what I always did before.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Pray that the famiglia struggles don't chew through too many common folk, and that Signora Sicilia would come to 'mete out justice' for us in the end.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: However, a brave man told us that he thinks the famiglia system is evil, and that all of this is unjust.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: He wanted to change everything, and so he pinned his hopes on me.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: All of you, just like me, come from outside the famiglia system.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You've all worked with me for so many years, and I believe that among you, there are those who harbor even greater grievances against the famiglie than I, and those who understand the status quo more deeply than I.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Therefore, I would like to ask all of you to help me.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: A moment of silence passes.
What can we even do?
attributes.name: Bailiff

attributes.content: The separation sequence of the new city's core area started not long ago.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: This confirms the conspiracy conjured by the Bellones and Saluzzos, as revealed by Ministro Rubio.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: For the famiglie, this was the spark that ignited new conflict. And for us, it is an opportunity.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The new nomadic city will be our bargaining chip amidst the chaos, whether negotiating with Signora Sicilia, or jockeying for power with the famiglie.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Another moment of silence passes.
Even with all of us together, we don't have enough people.
attributes.name: Bailiff

attributes.content: I have two reliable friends.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Hello, everyone!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Cellinia?! Why are you—
attributes.name: Bailiff

attributes.content: And how come I never heard of another Sankta in Volsinii...?
attributes.name: Bailiff

attributes.content: All you need to know is that Cellinia and her friend are on our side.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Also, Ministro Rubio left some resources to help me, and I managed to get in touch with them.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: They will assist us.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: But, I must be honest with you all.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: This is a perilous road, and I can't guarantee that everyone will survive.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Those who don't want to put their lives on the line are free to leave.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Even if we succeed, will it really accomplish anything?
attributes.name: Bailiff

attributes.content: I can't promise you it will.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The only thing I can promise... is that I'm willing to give my life for this.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Only thirty-some-odd people remain.
But they have no intention of leaving.
I should be thanking you for giving me this opportunity, Your Honor.
attributes.name: Serious Bailiff

attributes.content: I would've gone crazy without you here at the courthouse.
attributes.name: Serious Bailiff

attributes.content: I heard the radio broadcast, I knew right away what happened.
attributes.name: Resolute Bailiff

attributes.content: And honestly, I can't take this anymore.
attributes.name: Resolute Bailiff

attributes.content: Maybe we won't actually be able to do anything in the end, but I at least want those wise guys to know that we're not lumps of finmeat for them to butcher.
attributes.name: Angry Bailiff

attributes.content: Thank you, all of you.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Signorina Lavinia, ready on our end.
attributes.name: Siracusan Official

attributes.content: So soon?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Haha, the famiglie are all stirred up now.
attributes.name: Siracusan Official

attributes.content: They don't usually give the common folk a second look. Even now, they probably don't think we can get in their way at all.
attributes.name: Siracusan Official

attributes.content: But we have to let them know that they've never really had a hand in running the city.
attributes.name: Siracusan Official

attributes.content: This town belongs to us.
attributes.name: Siracusan Official

attributes.content: Take your people and go to the control tower.
attributes.name: Siracusan Official

attributes.content: We'll use everything at our disposal to hold back the wise guys as best as we can.
attributes.name: Siracusan Official

attributes.content: Thank you. Do your best.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: We're the ones who should be thanking you.
attributes.name: Siracusan Official

attributes.content: We never took the famiglie head on, and now we're leaving the most dangerous work to you.
attributes.name: Siracusan Official

attributes.content: I'm ready and willing.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: In bocca al lupo.
attributes.name: Siracusan Official

attributes.content: Crepi.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You used Carracci as bait, got your own son involved, and even tricked your own associates under the righteous pretense of handling Sicilia, all to muddy the waters of this city.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: You didn't even waver in the face of Saluzzo's lone wolf. Instead, you took that opportunity to drag Saluzzo into the mud with you.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: The high-profile assassination of the Rossati girl was, on one hand, to convince Alberto that he had an ally in you, while on the other hand, serving as an example to the other famiglie.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: You've made full use of Texas as your final card. In Giovanna's hands, the Rossatis were a deadly but hidden saber.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: But in Wallach's hands, they are a savage and ostentatious knife.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: You saw Rubio's connection with Carracci, and even took advantage of his anger. He thought no one knew his self-restraint, he never expected that you had already uncovered him.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: I knew you'd be in town, but I didn't expect you to see through all my plans so easily.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: It is always easier to trace back the steps in retrospect.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: And your plan has already been set in motion. Even if I was able to deduce all this, there is nothing more I can do.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Even if Sicilia were to pop up right here, right now, even she would be hard-pressed to resolve everything.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Who would have imagined that the don of the most powerful famiglia would use his own people as bait to bring all the others down with him?
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: You don't seem particularly upset about it.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Sicilia never asked me for a Siracusa that would flourish forever.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: And I was never after wealth or power.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: What you've done undoubtedly breaks the rules that Sicilia established, and so, I really did come to end you.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: But your father-son talk there surprised me.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Sicilia has never tolerated any disruptions to her order because no one came with an answer that could satisfy her.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: But you, Bernardo, have an excellent son.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: You won't be able to shake apart this society Sicilia built with her own two hands. Not by yourself.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: But, if your son came along with you, then maybe...
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: It wouldn't be completely impossible.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Hahahaha!
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Life is full of surprises.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: I thought I realized my lifelong dream and could die happy today.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Who knew that I'd change my mind, that I'd want to live to see what Leon can do.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: It's too bad.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: For a moment, Agenir casts his gaze in the direction of Grey Hall.
Something inhuman is approaching.
I see, I've heard of this. Is it also a part of your plan?
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: It's something that has to be done. That's all.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Please go, Don Agenir.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: This is the price I have to pay.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: So be it.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Just a moment, Reverend.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Don Agenir, or rather, Padre, I've never prayed to anyone, in my entire life.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: And I don't think I'll find closure with anyone else.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: The Lord can't answer me.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: But right here, I do have some questions only you can answer.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: By all means.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: How did Signora Sicilia feel, when she came back from Laterano?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Conflicted.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: She was distressed about the challenges she was to face.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: She was looking forward to the society she was about to create.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: More or less the same as you're feeling right now.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Alright, okay. I know. You be careful too.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: How're Texas n' Exusiai doin'?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Uh, they're with Lavinia right now. Said they were doing her a favor.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: The judge lady, huh? Least she's a bit more put together'n the Bellone family fellers from before.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Hope nothin' bad happens to 'em.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Ugh... Nngh...
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Miss Giovanna! Y-You're awake?!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I'm... not dead?
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: The assassin missed your heart by a couple centimeters, and you pulled through.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I gotta say, though, it's a good thing you're in such excellent shape. Otherwise, you probably wouldn't have made it.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Wallach...
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: How long was I unconscious for?
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: A day.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I'm guessing a lot has happened over the course of that day.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Tell me what's going on.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Alright...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You're finally here, Don... Or should I say, Zaaro.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Bernardo.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: What are you scheming?
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Don't play dumb. I can tell you're in denial about the conclusions you've drawn.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: You dare—
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Why wouldn't I dare?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: You've pushed into me a lifetime of power and betrayal. You're so prideful and arrogant, you never imagined that one day, I could betray you too.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Don't forget, Bernardo, I'm the one who made you everything you are!
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: A pitch-black mist wraps around Bernardo's neck.
But he pays it no heed.
You still don't get it, Zaaro.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: The game you Signori dei Lupi are playing means nothing to me.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Siracusa is the absolute limit of your imagination.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: You think that ultimate power is to control a country, multiple countries, or even to subjugate all the lands.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: But I don't think so.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Real power is the power to command an entire epoch.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: In my original plan, Siracusa would fall along with me.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Now, my son has shown me that he sees a bigger picture.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: You should take comfort in that.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Now, take that comfort back to your mountain forest.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: In this round of the game—
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: You... have lost.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: I lost? Hmph. I still have countless ways to—
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Il Signore dei Lupi has many ways to control his Fangs.
However, Zaaro immediately notices a trail of blood running from the corner of Bernardo's mouth.
Poison?!
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: You were planning this from the very beginning, weren't you? Bernardo!
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Bernardo does not answer. He has already lost the strength to speak.
He simply lifts his head and looks at the wide-open doors of the church.
His gaze passes over flowerbeds, tall buildings, and dark clouds.
Until it finally passes through time itself.
He sees the summer of that year when he, as a cobbler, was sweating profusely beneath the scorching sun.
But he felt an unprecedented fulfillment from it.
That feeling would haunt him for the rest of his life.
He slowly closes his eyes.
Like a true king.
Imbecile.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: You imbecile!
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: The giant wolf's roar reverberates through the church.
But no one is there to answer him.
After a while, he turns his gaze to the direction Leontuzzo left.
He does not accept such failure.
Absolutely not.
The streets of Volsinii are either packed with fighting famiglie, or completely empty.
Not a soul notices an old woman walking slowly over the city gate.
And not far away, a blindfolded Sankta quietly awaits her arrival.
You can already see the buildings of the new city from here?
attributes.name: Genial Old Lady

attributes.content: That's right. Spectacular, isn't it?
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Hah, if you ask me, the edges and corners are a bit too sharp for my liking.
attributes.name: Genial Old Lady

attributes.content: That just means your tastes are behind the times, Sicilia.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: How could yours be any better?
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: So, have you made up your mind?
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Not yet.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: Let's send out warnings to the noisiest famiglie.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: As Signora Sicilia's voice falls, a few black shadows spring out not too far behind her.
They quickly disappear into the buildings of Volsinii.
Then, I'd like to go see an old friend.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: Is my opinion alone not sufficient?
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: It's always better to get a second opinion, and a third.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: So you are here.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: Agenir told you that, didn't he?
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: Sure enough.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: I love the food here. It's great stuff.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: It's been a while, Ben.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: It certainly has, Sicilia.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: What brings you here, I wonder?
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: Any guesses?
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: If you just wanted to get the city back under control, you probably wouldn't come to me.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: Bernardo understands the wolfpack, and his plans ultimately boil down to four words: don't rock the boat.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: He's gotten the Dodici Famiglie all bloodthirsty, and that bloodlust doesn't quench easy.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: But it's not too hard either.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: But, I heard some other things from Agenir, and would like a little input from an old friend.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: I don't have anything in particular to say. This is a legitimate dining establishment, and it needs a new head chef. That's about it.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: I thought you'd have some feelings about the current state of Siracusa.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: Nostalgia is also a feeling.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: You're fickle, aren't you?
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: Do you really need my opinion?
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: Not really.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: But I am interested in hearing the thoughts of a man born to civilization who's removed himself from it.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: In every era, people are bound by the chains of the times into which they were born.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: You don't escape from that.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: Bernardo's ideals were an obsession born from your era.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: He was stuck with using violence to tear it down. He couldn't get past that.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: What about his son?
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: Who can say? It's not like I can predict the future.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: But you see it too, don't you?
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: We're watching the birth of a new era here.
attributes.name: Ben
